                        (function($, A){
                            window.setTimeout(function() {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            $("#site-search-mobile__button").click(function(e) {
                                        e.preventDefault();
                                        var t = $("#site-search-mobile__field").val().trim();
                                        if (t !== "") {
                                            window.location = "/search?q=" + t;
                                        }
                                    });
                                    $('#site-search__field').keydown(function(e){
                                        if(e.keyCode === 13){
                                            e.preventDefault();
                                            var t = $("#site-search-mobile__field").val().trim();
                                            if (t !== "") {
                                                window.location = "/search?q=" + t;
                                            }
                                        }
                                     });
                                                            }, 0);
                        })( jQuery, AUI() );
